features.feature_description: Easily set up dedicated workspaces for different teams or projects, and initiate group or private chats for seamless communication and collaboration.
Keep track of all workspace activities, monitor ongoing conversations, and oversee employee interactions to ensure effective communication.
Share important documents and files effortlessly within your team, ensuring everyone has access to the necessary resources.
Collaborate in real-time with your team, enabling faster decision-making and improved teamwork through instant messaging and file sharing.
